cards.question: When using bootstrap what is the only acceptable class to follow a '.row' class accoring to their best practices?
cards.answer: Any form of a '.col' class. For example '.col-md-6', '.col-lg-2', '.col-12'

cards.question: In CSS what type of selector begins with a '.'? For example '.start-button'.
cards.answer: This is a 'class selector.' It will select all elements with the class '.start-button'.

cards.question: When should you use 'var' to declare a variable?
cards.answer: NEVER! Don't do it. Never ever, ever, ever, ever use var.

cards.question: What do we add to a button so that an action can be performed upon clicking said button?
cards.answer: An event listener. Specifcally, a 'click' event listener.

cards.question: What do we call a function that is passed into another function as an argument?
When adding an object or to local storage what function must you run for it now to come back as [Object object]?
